resources.string: It’s time to Share your Likes & Dislikes in person with those whom you care!
Entrophy Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
Entrophy will send an SMS with OTP\n (One-Time Password) to verify your phone number.
Enter the verification number that’s\n sent to you over SMS.

Your Phone
 Number is
 Successfully
 Verified!
Friends who accept your invitation will appear on your dashboard. !
Soon after that, Entrophy will send notifications in real-time whenever your friend is around.
Now, it’s time to invite your close ones to Entrophy.
Your friends’ profile photos appear here as and when they accept your invite.
Don’t worry, when that happens, you’ll receive a notification!
Your friends’ profile photos along with their location and distance from your current location appear here!
You’ll get a bird’s eye view about distribution of your friends around the globe!
